description:
Kanada and Leiji make it to the auditorium unscathed, barely in time for the final performances. Amane and Nanami perform with sounds they had never before played. Furthermore, Leiji`s sounds, imbued with love and hate, envelop the auditorium with darkness, swallowing up the audience.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 青空のグランドフィナーレ
